List valid options for a categorical field

Source: R/ala_categories.R
ala_categories.Rd

Used for checking filter values for `ala_occurrences` and `ala_counts` are valid

ala_categories(field, limit = 20)

Arguments

field

string: field to return the categories for. Use `ala_fields` to view valid fields.
limit

numeric: maximum number of categories to return. 20 by default.

Value

a dataframe of field name and category name.

Examples

ala_categories("basis_of_record")

#>              field               category
#> 1  basis_of_record       HumanObservation
#> 2  basis_of_record      PreservedSpecimen
#> 3  basis_of_record     MachineObservation
#> 4  basis_of_record       EnvironmentalDNA
#> 5  basis_of_record         MaterialSample
#> 6  basis_of_record         LivingSpecimen
#> 7  basis_of_record             GenomicDNA
#> 8  basis_of_record                  Image
#> 9  basis_of_record                  Sound
#> 10 basis_of_record NomenclaturalChecklist
#> 11 basis_of_record         FossilSpecimen
#> 12 basis_of_record                  Video
ala_categories("state")

#>   field                     category
#> 1 state              New South Wales
#> 2 state                     Victoria
#> 3 state                   Queensland
#> 4 state              South Australia
#> 5 state            Western Australia
#> 6 state           Northern Territory
#> 7 state                     Tasmania
#> 8 state Australian Capital Territory
